settings.code:
Nexode RG 65W Series

Overview Specs
Buy Now
Nexode RG 65W Charger

Let's Go! Charge Up!

High-Speed
Robo-Charging

RG turbo charges your devices! Recharge the MacBook Air M2 to 51% in 30 minutes for high-speed charging in a flash!

30mins MacBook Air M2

51%

*The data comes from UGREEN Lab.

Smart Charging
Status Display

A mini-smart screen displays the charging status in real-time with various cute expressions! RG emojis tell you when devices are charging or fully charged!

Compatibility Wider than a Football Field

RG chargers are compatible with all modern smartphones and tablets, and support various fast changer protocols including PD/QC/SCP/FCA.

Next-Gen Protection in a Futuristic Shell

RG is designed to provide an abundance of charging power to your devices, with just a hint of cuteness! With a flame-retardant shell and Airpyra stacking technology, RG has maximized safety in a minimized size, giving you full protection and portability. The magnetic removable shoes protect RG's prongs from damage for an added level of safety.

Thermal Guard™ Detection

Ugreen's built-in Thermal Guard™ system monitors temperature changes in real-time helping RG provide instant protection from overheating, overcharge, and excessive current.

Ice-Cold, Bold GaNFast™ Chips

GaNFast™ IC chips in the RG provide 95% energy conversion efficiency meaning there's less energy loss and better heat reduction while charging. Your electronic devices will charge faster and save energy overall during a charge.

Ugreen's Commitment to a Greener World

With one GaNFast™ chip, we can reduce up to 8.8 pounds of CO2 production compared to traditional Silicon chips and it's estimated that by 2050, our chargers will have reduced nearly 5,503 tons of CO2, the equivalent to waste generated by over 650 coal-fired power stations, over six billion barrels of oil, or the annual electricity use of over 470 million homes.

*Data source: Navitas Semiconductor website official calculation.
